footer.content: Meta TM is the world's first trademark NFT Marketplace, where you tokenize your trademarks. Our trusted sellers are approved, whitelisted owners of trademarks..

workData.title: Register and whitelist
workData.text: Register for a new account and complete registration to apply for our whitelist. Only approved users and wallets can proceed.

workData.title: Set up your wallet
workData.text: Once youâ€™ve been approved for the whitelist. Set up your wallet of choice, connect it by clicking 'Connect button' at the top right corner of the marketplace.

workData.title: Add your NFTs
workData.text: Upload your trademark (image, text), add a title and description, and the trademark serial number.

workData.title: List them for sale
workData.text: Choose between auctions, fixed-price listings, and declining-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs!
